content.rendered:
Enterprise Wi-Fi and switching solutions that simply just work – scaling from small offices to the highest density venues, application-aware to match the needs of your business, and simple to deploy and operate via a cloud-based system – all delivered at a disruptively low total cost of ownership

Network Management
and Services

Simple yet sophisticated platform and tools to plan, deploy and manage your network. Cloud first architecture that is easy to operate. Licensing appropriate for any sized business small to large.

  • Right-sized for any use case from 1 to 100K+ devices
  • Zero touch provisioning & maintenance
  • Policy based access with Azure/G-suite integration

View Software

Enterprise Wi-Fi
Access Points

Wi-Fi access points and service provider routers right-sized for any organization. ‘Wire-like’ performance with powerful edge services secure the network and enhance the user experience.

  • High density architecture lowers total cost of ownership
  • Integrated controller simplifies deployment & architecture
  • Edge compute with integrated location services (no separate appliance)

View Access Points

Ethernet
Switches

Next-generation switching platform offers a cloud-managed, high-performance, enterprise-grade Ethernet switching solution. Advanced automation capabilities streamline operations.

  • Zero touch deployments with Policy Based Automation
  • Enhanced Security with automated device profiling and segmentation
  • Non-blocking, line-rate architecture with fully featured L2/L3 switching

View Switches

Premium Ecosystem Partners:

Category:  Wi-Fi Access Gateway

Use cases: Campus Connectivity, Education, Smart Cities, Service Provider/Public Wi-Fi.

Learn More

Category: Location Services

Use cases: Location aware services and business analytics leveraging Wi-Fi, BLE and sensor networks.

Learn More

Category: Wi-Fi Roaming

Use cases: Wi-Fi monetization, Wi-Fi offload from cellular.

Learn More

Full Technology Portfolio:

Partners receive significant savings on Enterprise Partner Starter Kit.

Request Your Kit

Application partners for Cambium/Xirrus Enterprise Wi-Fi

Digitize public spaces, simplify edge applications, get insights from location analytics, deliver guest experiences & more…

  • Digitizing physical spacesDelivering customer engagements
  • Simplifying edge applications Wi-Fi Access Gateway
  • Guest, customer, student Wi-Fi & engagement Secure guest access on your branded landing page
  • Location AnalyticsInsights into customer behavior in a public venue
  • MSP Manage & operate public and enterprise WiFi networks
  • Wi-Fi Network DesignTools for designing & troubleshooting WiFi networks
  • Security & Identity ServicesEnd user device & application monitoring & management

The Kloudspot Platform is a cloud-based, network-enabled, location-based services and analytics platform; the Kloudspot Platform provides trusted insights and intelligence into the behavior of visitors, employees and assets to drive actions.
Learn more>>

Powerful platforms that enhance Wi-Fi networks, providing revenue opportunities through analytics, guest intelligence, and marketing automation/advertising; engage with guests, promote your brand, deliver targeted ad campaigns, and get real-time analytics.

Benu Networks’ Wi-Fi Access Gateway simplifies distributed Wi-Fi networks in multiple locations, networks requiring enhanced security and administration of subscriber policies; Benu Networks’ WAG is used for public Wi-Fi, smart cities, hospitality Wi-Fi and more.
Learn more>>

Edge network head-end purpose-built for service providers to maximize revenue, minimize cost, and easily scale, integrating with property management systems for delivering dynamic ad placement in customer web browsers

ADIPSYS designed their HOTSPOT MANAGER software suite to enable business integrators and service operators to centrally manage all types of Wi-Fi hotspots; this cloud-based solution enables partners to quickly and efficiently deploy Wi-Fi portals.
Learn more>>

An integrated solution designed for growth allowing service providers to maintain control over the usage of the hotspot while deploying a cost-effective, scalable network; offers a marketing walled garden with prepaid vouchers and on-the-spot mobile payment

A modern service providing public hotspots, which allows your customers a free, safe, and straightforward way of connecting to WiFi via various social login methods; offers marketing analytics on network users for targeted promotional strategies

Cloud4Wi enables businesses and organizations to extract value from existing Wi-Fi infrastructure by offering customers with effortless internet connection; all the while, businesses gather powerful customer location intelligence.
Learn more>>

Cloudi-Fi is 100% cloud-based SaaS solution that transforms Wi-Fi access into a new communication channel, offering employees and visitors personalized digital services; the solution allows you to optimize user experience, create unique campaigns and more.
Learn more>>

Encapto WiFi is a one-stop configuration, management, reporting and control system for your multi-customer Wi-Fi networks; offers advanced hotspot management, granular access control, WYSIWYG portal builder, multi-tenant permissions and more.
Learn more>>

The FREDERIX Hotspot Wi-Fi access and marketing solution is a plugin-based Wi-Fi platform for any size project; it is cloud-based and modular, includes customizable functionality and offers individual captive portals.
Learn more>>

Powerful platforms that enhance WiFi networks, providing revenue opportunities through analytics, guest intelligence, and marketing automation/advertising; engage with guests, promote your brand, deliver targeted ad campaigns, and get real-time analytics.

The Kloudspot Platform is a cloud-based, network-enabled, location-based services and analytics platform; the Kloudspot Platform provides trusted insights and intelligence into the behavior of visitors, employees and assets to drive actions.
Learn more>>

Purposeful technology empowering educators to inspire their students; designed for educators, one simple and customizable platform helps guide classroom learning, promote collaboration, and make the most of class time

Nomadix provides hotel owners, brands, property management groups and MSPs with a suite of solutions to enhance the guest and tenant experience; enables users to stream TV shows, book appointments and use smart in-room devices.
Learn more>>

All-in-one appliance that manage hotspot networks simply and effectively with an innovative radius system for customer authentication based on SMS or social networks, freeing administrators from manual account registration; provides prepaid voucher in association with PayPal

TRIAX EoC provides customers with reliable high-speed guest Wi-Fi by unleashing the power of existing coax cables; combine coax and CAT cables to create one uniform Wi-Fi network that offers a seamless user experience.
Learn more>>

The Weblib UCOPIA solutions integrate with all the elements of your network to improve the user experience, make Wi-Fi secure and simplify management; Weblib offers in-store tracking, customer experience analytics and more.
Learn more>>

Wi-Fi Hotel turns hospitality Wi-Fi into an automated selling and reputation machine; offer different service levels to guests, advertise additional services, boost positive customer reviews and more.
Learn more>>

A service that allows you to know/track who is using your internet; offers the ability to identify actual users at any time; authentication via email, SMS, social logins, loyalty cards, PMS, and voucher codes

Latest-generation hotspot platform for WiFi networks, allowing service managers to offer innovative services by using and enhancing the infrastructure and WiFi connectivity; designed to advance customer journeys and support marketing campaigns, lead generation, loyalty, and user experience

Aislelabs platform allows venues to leverage Wi-Fi as a powerful channel for location intelligence and marketing; the platform maximizes the potential of spaces including campuses, airports, shopping centers and more.
Learn more>>

AVSystem’s Linkyfi offers access management, tailored marketing and a location engine that provides them with extra data; use that data to attract visitors, increase customer awareness and upsell retail and marketing space.
Learn more>>

Powerful platforms that enhance WiFi networks, providing revenue opportunities through analytics, guest intelligence, and marketing automation/advertising; engage with guests, promote your brand, deliver targeted ad campaigns, and get real-time analytics.

The Kloudspot Platform is a cloud-based, network-enabled, location-based services and analytics platform; the Kloudspot Platform provides trusted insights and intelligence into the behavior of visitors, employees and assets to drive actions.
Learn more>>

MobiMESH inPiazza uses A.I.-based location services and proximity marketing to drive the customer journey through digital and physical touchpoints; successfully applied in malls, public areas, restaurants, hotels and more.
Learn more>>

Enterprise Wi-Fi, analytics, engagement, and navigation solutions for physical spaces; free, fast, secure Wi-Fi for guest; Wi-Fi analytics; engagement/marketing activity; wayfinding; and brand management with free integrations

A cloud-based AWS platform offering rich, dynamic interaction leveraging ML and real-time data to deliver the most relevant content to clients; nurture customer loyalty and operationalize decision-making processes

Innovative business solutions leveraging S/4HANA to simplify operations and reduce costs; explore C/4HANA to drive omnichannel, personalized experiences; enable operations with IT support services

Skyfii transforms Wi-Fi location data into intelligent insights on visitor behavior, movement and space utilization; provides venue marketers and operators with the data they need to deliver improved guest experiences.
Learn more>>

Value-added end-to-end solutions, providing consultation, UI/UX design, development, hosting and support in an integrated solution for customers; offers web and CMS, mobile app, WiFi and indoor location, and mobile messaging

Wiacom is a Wi-Fi analytics and communications platform that helps marketing teams digitize their visitors and clients presence; it can be applied at shopping malls, hotels, large public venues and more.
Learn more>>

An integrated OSS, BSS cloud-computing solution provider for ISPs, providing flexible options for convergent billing, provisioning customer care, policy control, and payment solutions that help lower the total cost of ownership

Encapto WiFi is a one-stop configuration, management, reporting and control system for your multi-customer Wi-Fi networks; offers advanced hotspot management, granular access control, WYSIWYG portal builder, multi-tenant permissions and more.
Learn more>>

The Epitiro Agent connects to different networks, measures radio conditions, and accesses key services and applications; customize dashboards and share access with customers, receive performance alerts and automate report creation.
Learn more>>

A flexible WiFi solution portfolio, making management and operation of WiFi smart and simple; offers software and services for the management of WiFi networks, virtualization of WiFi routers, and facilitation of connection to WiFi networks

Powerful platforms that enhance WiFi networks, providing revenue opportunities through analytics, guest intelligence, and marketing automation/advertising; engage with guests, promote your brand, deliver targeted ad campaigns, and get real-time analytics.

Flexible central authentication options to serve customers with internet connectivity and other services through a single platform; create value for customers, offer a single app for services, access cloud-hosted AAA platform, extract user data, and more

An integrated BSS suite enabling rapid launch of new revenue services across many types of enterprises without countless hours of integration; deliver SD-WAN, vCPE, and managed services using a range of routers, SDN, and NFV solutions

A cloud-based authentication platform that helps you improve the security of your network and enhance the guest experience; flexible support for social networks, SAML, billing, vouchers, SMS, G suite, Azure/O365, Rest API, and more

Comprehensive ISP management solutions to help manage and monitor all aspects of business operations with flexible end-to-end SaaS and on-premise solutions; supports lead management to provisioning, subscriber life-cycle management, policy enforcement, billing, mobile apps, and more

A locally run solution that helps you see and manage all devices, with easy set-up, providing visibility and control of devices connected to home networks; offers parental controls, bandwidth monitoring, mobile protection, speed testing, and more

Email security, DNS filtering, and email archiving solutions for business and MSPs; provides protection from malware, email phishing, spoofing, and malicious websites; offers DNS filter, email anti-spam and security, and email archiving

WISPControl is an integral management platform designed for internet providers; this single management platform allows internet providers to optimise management time between their clients, network and services.
Learn more>>

A customizable solution for communicating with customers and employees; display targeted promotions, products, and services over your company’s WiFi; improve customer loyalty, create polls, personalize offers, and more

Bandwidth management software solutions for service providers, offering advanced AAA RADIUS server; internet billing system for prepaid-postpaid billing, rating, and charging; franchisee and subscriber management for new operators and existing ISPs

Ekahau offers a suite of Wi-Fi tools to quickly design, optimize, and troubleshoot Wi-Fi networks, minimizing network deployment time and ensuring sufficient wireless coverage across all industries, project sizes, building infrastructures and levels of complexity.
Learn more>>

Powerful software solution for designing WiFi and cellular networks; helps you design and deploy a wireless network your customers, employees, and business can depend on

Digital experience management solutions to see exactly what users see on their screen, regardless app or device being used; boost customer satisfaction and workforce productivity; shorten release cycles; improve app quality; and positively impact your bottom line

Genetec leverages existing infrastructure and innovative software to track occupancy while anonymizing data to ensure privacy; tracks occupancy at airports, retail stores, transit stations and more.
Learn more>>

Location data solutions for deeper understanding of customer behavior, helping you improve brand engagement and loyalty and increase customer engagement with seamless internet access, on-the-go global WiFi vouchers, and more

Transformative solution for configuring, managing, and supporting devices at every endpoint; increase productivity with seamless access to apps; allow BYOD without sacrificing security; safeguard company data at every layer

LOCH provides customers with the full-spectrum wireless visibility, cost management, performance monitoring, and security that organizations need to evolve at speed and scale. LOCH’s mission is to help organizations master rapid transformation and thrive in a wireless world.
